menu

This month our menu is inspired by the traditions of the Japanese Izakaya. A place to come with friends to sit, chat and most of all, eat. Below we have a selection of smaller dishes or 'Sakana' that can be shared like tapas, and further down we have the more hearty meals of Donburi, Katsukare and Ramen. Whatever your choice, we are sure you enjoy.


Sakana 肴 Snacks

Edamame 枝豆 Green Soy Beans (v, gf) £3
Takoyaki たこ焼き Octopus Dumplings (gf) £6
Yakatori 焼き鳥 Grilled Chicken Skewers (gf) £6
Gyuniku 牛肉 Grilled Beef (gf) £7
Tonkatsu 豚カツ Deep Fried Breaded Pork (gf) £7
Tori no Karaage 鶏の唐揚げJapanese Fried Chicken (gf) £6
Ebi no Tempura 海老の天ぷらTempura Prawns (gf) £6
Agedashi Dofu 揚げ出し豆腐 Deep Fried Tofu (v, gf) £6
Yasai no Tempura野菜の天ぷらTempura Vegetables (v, gf) £6
Yasai Itame 野菜炒め Stir Fried Vegetables (v, gf) £5

If you have any allergies, please inform a member of staff who will be happy to help you. We thank you for your custom and wish you an enjoyable meal.
